data.client_settings: Cross-platform, client independent. Reproduced on Android app (Alpha 7.8.3), some people can repro on Desktop app.
data.actual_result: It says that your password got changed successfully, even though nothing has changed and you can still login with your old password
data.short_description: [Cross platform] The Change password feature allows you to change your password to something made only out of spaces. It will say Success even though your password won't change
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your account settings - Change password - Fill the New password field with only spaces - Submit
